title: (x) Old Dutch Snack Foods logo - custom designed {Patricia}
content:
Hello...need some help again. Just need the Old Dutch text:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821120954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/old-dutch_5229.jpg)

Thanks in advance!
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
Hi Skippy,  
for something remotely similiar, try [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821120954/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Underware)’s [Fakir](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821120954/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/fakir_black_italic_ot/?sample_text=Old%20Dutch&sample_size=60), a contemporary faux-blackletter – fat & frolic.  
F

Yeah, I had a feeling it was custom, but figured I’d try posting here in case I was wrong. Oh well...wasn’t too much of an effort to redraw in Illustrator.

Thanks again, folks!
